Posts.Content: mari479 wrote: Hours ago when I was showering I noticed a lump near my breast, when I checked it it was hard and immovable, and when I tried pressing it I felt pain and I got worried (I'm just 19 by the way). So I tried checking all over the internet and found out that movable and soft lumps unlike mine are benign. My menstrual period started hours after I discovered it and I'm waiting for around a week before I tell anyone (haven't told even my mom yet). What do you guys think this is? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hard lump near breast mari479
